name: COVID AI!
description:
The modern-day COVID-19 crisis. AI has advanced to human-level intelligence and cognition. Humans are too divided over how to handle issues, so world leaders turn to AI to make world-altering decisions that will impact billions of human lives. You are this AI. Choose wisely, because the consequences could get out-of-control.

You are K-AI, an artificial intelligence capable of making decisions that will shape the course of human history. Be careful to balance the four values---public opinion, money, government, and health---or else things might get really out of control.

Use the left and right arrow keys to select a choice. Use the up arrow key to confirm that choice.

Good luck. The fate of humanity---however out-of-control that becomes---is in your hands!
